alert.note: Alert for Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 8:17AM PST until December 28 at 1:06PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Grays River near Rosburg. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 12.0 feet, expect continued flooding of roads along and near the Grays River, including roadway approaches to the Altoona Bridge over the Grays, and portions of Covered Bridge Road, Barr-Durrah Road, and Loop Road near Rosburg and Hwy 4. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM PST Wednesday was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected drop below flood stage later this morning and continue falling through Thursday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Don`t drive around road closure barricades or into flooded areas. Find another route. Additional information is available at weather.gov/portland. The next statement will be issued by 4 pm PST today.
